Name: Commect VR
About the game: Commect VR, connect all beautiful scenery and scenes in the world and universe, provide high-quality creation and immersive experience, create the next generation of immersive entertainment products! Players can build all kinds of high-quality real and virtual spaces together, so that people can enjoy the beautiful scenery, parties, entertainment with friends from all over the world without leaving home, and experience tens of thousands of high-quality immersive spaces. -Commect VR is free of charge and can be used across platforms on VR glasses, computers, mobile phones and other devices. -Use the creator's SDK to create a variety of favorite high-quality spaces and avatars -Discover all kinds of interesting spaces, experience the beauty of the world and all kinds of amazing spaces Join our fast-growing community, and let's create and explore the next generation of 3D Internet!
